channel.title: Windows help
channel.description: I installed pc booster 2008 and it fucked up my computer. Now every line of text is in wingdings or some symbol font. Anyone know how to fix it? (If you say install linux, go die).

item.title: Windows help
item.dc:creator: @Flaming_Idiot Flaming Idiot
item.description:
@Flaming_Idiot wrote:

I don’t know if this will work, but open the registry editor ( Go Start -> Run, or press Win+R, and type “regedit” ) and navigate to “HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontSubstitutes”.

There you should see a value called “MS Shell Dlg”, double click it, if it does not say either “Tahoma” or “Microsoft Sans Serif” in the text box then set it to “Tahoma”. Do the same for “MS Shell Dlg 2” and reset your computer.

Read full topic
